speaker: Midnight Forge
lines: You pull the hood low and watch the sparks fall.
You bring the steel to a steady glow.
You lower the bar into the quench and listen for the hiss.
You match your rhythm to the work you were shown.
You set the edge on the anvil and true it.
A shape moves at the edge of the light.
You raise the hammer and finish the heat.
You choose what to make of this hour.
